title: The Man in Black (restored, colorized) (1950, thriller, imdb score: 6)

sources.title: The Man in Black (restored, colorized) (1950, thriller, imdb score: 6)
sources.description: The Man in Black is a 1950 British thriller film directed by Francis Searle and starring Betty Ann Davies , Sheila Burrell and Sid James . It was adapted by Hammer Film Productions from the popular British radio series Appointment with Fear featuring Valentine Dyall . Dyall (The "Man in Black" of the radio series) here provides the on screen introduction to the film, as "The Story-Teller."
